website_summaries.verdict: Ships as a kit with brushes, which is great for those new to using dog toothpaste. Especially helps with bad breath.
pros: Offers brushes of varying shapes to help with multiple dogs and different shaped mouths
Dogs seem to like the taste, although it may take a few days of brushing before they're used to it
cons: If you only need toothpaste, price per ounce is high
Some customers say brushes are cheaply made outside the U.S

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Weird rate features. I did not taste it, but my Dog did not barf, so it must be alright. He did get really excited after it was done, so it seems like he liked having this done. Now I brush his teeth every day. because he's my buddy.
customer_reviews.author: ATXsteve

customer_reviews.title: The brush makes the gums bleed
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even use the brush if your dog freaks out just put it on your finger and use it on his teeth it’s enzyme activated you don’t need to brush you need three times a week though
customer_reviews.author: Rev.Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I bought this based on the good reviews but was perturbed to find that the toothpaste ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the good reviews but was perturbed to find that the toothpaste does not have any ingredients listed. I was able to figure out that it was made in China and regularly sold in the UK but nothing about what was in it. At the recommendation of our vet we wound up tossing the toothpaste and will be using the toothbrushes that were included with a better known brand of paste.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan King

customer_reviews.title: My dog does not like it
customer_reviews.text: My dog does not like the taste of this stuff. Her breath smells good after I use it but it's a fight to get her to let me brush her teeth. I should have purchased peanutbutter flavored toothpaste (do they make that? if they don't, don't try, patent pending!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Mangan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This item is very good- exactly what I hoped for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Miller

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Chihuahua. My dog actually has taken to the flavor AND seems to enjoy the scrub action from the toothbrushes. He licks, then smiles so I can scrub his teeth. A new pet trick for my canine. I am training my canine to chill while I brush, then smile when I tell him to "show me those pearly whites", I must say my dogs teeth are whiter than my own!
customer_reviews.author: MARK A MONTEZ

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: First time I have ever received an email from a company asking if my product I had ordered arrived as expected and was I happy with it, if not they would make it right. Very impressive to have a company care that much about their customers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonosalt

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend!! Made My Dog Sick!!
customer_reviews.text: It was terrible. Made my dogs sick. Do Not Recommend!! Judy M.
customer_reviews.author: Judy McPherson

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. If you're like me
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. If you're like me, you want to avoid an expensive visit to the vet for dental work, so I brush my dogs teeth with this every other day or so. She doesn't hate it. Helps breath and tartar buildup.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! The dog had an attack when I placed the mint toothpaste on my finger in his mouth. I should have ordered beef or chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: This will be good for our Dog. She won't like it but I like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Workman

customer_reviews.title: but once finished her teeth were clean and smelled great. Varying brushes is a nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Took some serious enticing to get my dog to agree to the brushing ordeal, but once finished her teeth were clean and smelled great. Varying brushes is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm?
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are good. However, we used this for the first time last night and my dog vomited over night and again this morning ... I'm not sure if there's a connection but it sure seems like it...
customer_reviews.author: Thorita

customer_reviews.title: ... is exactly what I wanted and the brushes are great, Might take a while to get my fur ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted and the brushes are great, Might take a while to get my fur baby to stop just chewing on my finger though :-)
customer_reviews.author: Diane Roulston

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a few days & seem like a good product, my pup doesn't mind the taste, was delivered fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My two Labs love the taste of this. They will sit still to get their teeth brushed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: because his breathe smelled like ass. but these helped
customer_reviews.text: my nickname for my dog when from bud-bud to butt-butt, because his breathe smelled like ass. but these helped!
customer_reviews.author: Neilson Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap pet dental care. My pupper is afraid of the toothbrush but loves the taste. We manage lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised- I'd give it five stars but my dogs are picky and don't appreciate the taste so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like the taste and it is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Vinyl Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Cesar likes it
customer_reviews.text: My pomeranian hates to be brushed, but doesn't mind having his teeth brushed. It 'some working well.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mom

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves this stuff and i love the smell! id buy again and the brushes are nice and gentle :)
customer_reviews.author: Alisa&Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was really minty and the dog liked it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh on the Mint
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly but my Pug does not like the mint flavor
customer_reviews.author: Aimee S.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs don't like it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs don't like the taste, can get that from my toothpaste
customer_reviews.author: Alan Reid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice so far and it's working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: carolb12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the finger brush. My dog does not mind the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Celi

customer_reviews.title: Mint toothpaste is not a winner
customer_reviews.text: Dog won't let me get near him. I don't think he likes the mint flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a help and arived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: kim a quarnberg

customer_reviews.title: Dog toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: My dog tolerates this toothpaste OK. The finger brush is useless because it won't stay on my finger. I went back to a dog brush I already had.
customer_reviews.author: ar180

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I didn't read the reviews and found out after ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I didn't read the reviews and found out after purchasing that it's not made in the USA. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: M girl Queenie likes it and that's all it matters!
customer_reviews.text: Queenie opens her mouth when she sees me coming with the brush! I also give her dental sticks twice a day and she has whiter teeth than I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Chiappe

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to have her teeth brushed by this toothbrush set. The only thing I had a slight qualm about was the handle of the toothbrush wasn't too thick and the toothpaste tube wasn't filled up all the way, but the set that you get...the little finger brushes AND the toothbrush itself, and toothpaste is awesome. My dog loves the taste of mint. :) Edit: It is mint flavoured. not vanilla. Not sure why it says it's vanilla flavoured in the product description. Just zoom in on the product and it says mint. Not a big deal. Edit: 5 months after my dog's last teeth cleaning and my dog is still tartar free.
customer_reviews.author: E. Prender

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tool in this kit is the toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tool in this kit is the toothbrush. It's taken me a bit to get the hang of brushing my dog's back teeth, then the vet said to just stick it back there and let him chew on it for a bit, and now brushing isn't such a chore. Both my dogs like the taste of the toothpaste too!
customer_reviews.author: MB
